/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, indicating the city's active transportation system. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene.
